data.title: Salah Mansour posted on LinkedIn
data.text:
Die Zerstörung und das Leid nach der #Erdbebenkatastrophe in der Türkei und in Syrien sind erschütternd. Unser Mitgefühl gilt allen Menschen in den betroffenen Gebieten, unseren Kolleginnen und Kollegen der #KfW vor Ort sowie allen Mitarbeitenden unserer Projektpartner, die um ihre Familien und Freunde trauern und um die Gesundheit der Verletzten bangen. Die KfW baut ihre Unterstützung für die von der Erdbebenkatastrophe betroffenen Menschen in der #Türkei und in #Syrien weiter aus. Sie hat in enger Abstimmung mit der Bundesregierung umgehend schnelle und effiziente #Unterstützung mit allen Partnern und UN-Organisationen angestoßen, um die dringendsten Bedarfe der von den Folgen des Jahrhunderterdbebens betroffenen Menschen zu decken. 💙 The destruction and suffering following the earthquake disaster in #Türkiye and #Syria are appalling. Our condolences go out to all the people in the affected areas, our KfW colleagues on site and all the employees of our project partners who are mourning for their families and friends. KfW is further increasing its #support for the people affected by the earthquake disaster in Türkiye and Syria. In close coordination with the German Federal Government, it has immediately initiated rapid and effective support with all partners and UN organisations to meet the most urgent needs of the people affected by the consequences of the region's worst earthquake in a century. 💙 #Türkiye ve #Suriye'de yaşanan deprem felaketinin yol açtığı tahribat ve acı sarsıcı boyutta. Etkilenen bölgelerdeki tüm insanların, sahadaki KfW çalışma arkadaşlarımızın, ailelerini ve arkadaşlarını kaybeden ve yaralıların sağlığı için endişe duyan proje ortaklarımızın bünyesindeki tüm çalışanların acılarını ve endişelerini paylaşıyoruz. KfW, deprem felaketinden etkilenen Türkiye ve Suriye'deki insanlar için sağladığı desteğin kapsamını artırıyor. Federal hükümet ile yakın işbirliği içinde çalışarak, yüzyılın depreminin sonuçlarından etkilenen insanların en acil ihtiyaçlarını karşılamak üzere tüm ortaklar ve BM kuruluşları ile birlikte derhal hızlı ve etkin şekilde destek sağlamayı başlatmıştır. 💙 لا شك أن الدمار والألم اللذان أعقبا كارثة الزلزال الذي ضرب تركيا وسوريا مروعان. ونحن نعرب عن تعاطفنا مع جميع سكان المناطق المُتضررة ومع زميلاتنا وزملائنا في بنك الائتمان لإعادة الإعمارKfW العاملين هناك وكذلك مع جميع موظفي شركائنا في مشاريعنا الإنمائية وجميع الذين ينعون أعضاءٍ من عائلاتهم وأصدقائهم أو يخشون على صحة جرحاهم. يواصل بنك الائتمان لإعادة الإعمار KfW تكثيف دعمه للمُتضررين من كارثة الزلزال في تركيا وسوريا. حيث بدأ فوراً من خلال التعاون الوثيق مع الحكومة الألمانية بتقديم دعم سريع وعاجل وفعال مع جميع الشركاء والمنظمات التابعة للأمم المتحدة من أجل تغطية الاحتياجات المُلحة للأشخاص المُتضررين من عواقب زلزال القرن.

I'm really excited to announce the soft launch of SharedSeed! 😃😎🚀 SharedSeed is a place where knowledge and experiences are shared freely between professionals. It is a content platform, online community and social network centered around the idea of sharing knowledge and networking freely. The purpose of SharedSeed is to act as a platform to help professionals and employers to grow by sharing knowledge, experiences and practices. SharedSeed will allow professionals to publish their career profile, share their knowledge and experience through questions, answers and articles that are accessable to everyone, all in one place. If you have any suggestions or opinion about SharedSeed, please feel free to contact me. I would love to hear from you! ☺️
